title: Mobile Snatching Near Sec-12 Market, Karnal
summary: Victimâ€™s mobile was snatched by two youths on a red motorcycle near Sector 12 Market, Karnal at 21:30 hrs.

stages.info:
Victim: Ramesh Kumar, 32
Incident: Sec-12 Market, Karnal
Two youths on a red motorcycle fled towards Sec-9.
FIR lodged at PS Sec-13.
stages.question: What should be the FIRST investigative action?
options: Obtain CCTV coverage of entire Sec-12 market lane before it gets overwritten
Apply for CDR of victim's phone immediately
Issue wireless message to all districts
Call victim to police station again for details
stages.feedback_wrong: CCTV is time-sensitive; securing it immediately is mandatory.
stages.next_info: CCTV shows red bike moving towards Sec-9 with partial plate HR05T9.

stages.info: Partial plate: HR05T9. CCTV shows suspects taking turn towards Shiv Colony.
stages.question: Next step?
options: Collect CCTV from adjacent stretches to build continuous movement trail
Immediately raid Shiv Colony without confirming direction
Alert all Delhi borders
Rely solely on witness descriptions
stages.feedback_wrong: Continuous CCTV trail building is vital for movement reconstruction.
stages.next_info: New CCTV shows bike entering lane behind Arun Chowk.

stages.info:
Bike seen near Arun Chowk.
Nearby repair shops exist where plates are frequently altered.
stages.question: Best next investigative move?
options: Verify local repair shops for recent number-plate related work
Order mass checking at Karnal bus stand
Ask the victim to look for suspects in markets
Focus exclusively on missing bike complaints
stages.feedback_wrong: Repair shops often hold key clues in plate tampering.
stages.next_info: One shopkeeper confirms two youths replaced a number plate yesterday.

stages.info:
Repair shop owner gives description of youth: one in black hoodie, another tall, slim.
Provided a phone number used for payment via UPI.
stages.question: Your next step?
options: Obtain UPI transaction details and link the phone number
Arrest the shopkeeper for helping criminals
Start raids in all nearby villages
Call telecom companies for all subscriber data
stages.feedback_wrong: UPI transaction logs help trace the registered user immediately.
stages.next_info: Phone number registered to a juvenile from Sector 4.

stages.info: Phone registered to juvenile. Tower location shows last presence in Indri Road area.
stages.question: Next step?
options: Coordinate with local team for discreet verification at known youth hangouts
Make public announcement with suspect name
Seal entire highway
Wait for juvenile to voluntarily appear
stages.feedback_wrong: Discreet local verification prevents alerting suspects.
stages.next_info: Juvenile located; admits involvement; leads police to co-accused.

stages.info: Co-accused detained with the stolen phone.
stages.question: Final step?
options: Follow JJ Act for juvenile & conduct lawful recovery proceedings
Threaten accused to confess
Skip documentation since phone is recovered
Hand over accused to victim for compromise
stages.feedback_wrong: JJ Act compliance + lawful recovery is essential.
